page_intro.title: Internet Speaks Tamazight!
page_intro.CTA_text: Awal is a community-driven initiative to foster the Tamazight language in the digital realm. Our vision is clear: empower Tamazight to thrive with open-source technology, and we need you to accomplish that.
page_intro.text_2: Contribution is open to anyone who can read and write in Tamazight. We celebrate the rich diversity of Tamazight variants and welcome speakers from all backgrounds.
page_intro.text_3: For each translation registered in Awal Translate, you'll gain points and see how you compare with your fellow community members.
page_intro.text_4_1: Learn more about the initiative and our collaborators on our
page_intro.text_4_3: to get informed about latest news and connect with the Awal network.
page_intro.item_1_normal: Show your language skills by translating sentences to or from Tamazight in your own words.
page_intro.item_2_normal: Validate translations made by fellow volunteers, ensuring accuracy of the resulting technology.
page_intro.item_3_normal: Contribute speech data through Common Voice, giving Tamazight a voice in the digital world.

about.main_string_1:
Awal is a project that contributes to preserving and promoting the Amazigh language in the digital space by developing innovative tools that facilitate its use and dissemination.
The participation of Amazigh speakers will be essential to collect data, both oral and written, through voice recordings and collection of translated texts from this minority language. The initiative aims not only to create effective digital tools, but also to raise community awareness of the importance of linguistic data and new technologies to preserve the language, to raise awareness of the effects of the digital divide and to grow a network of professionals.
Awal is an initative by CIEMEN, Col·lectivaT and Casa Amaziga de Catalunya and is funded by the Municipality of Barcelona and Generalitat de Catalunya with the support of the Catalan Development Cooperation Agency and the Department of Social Rights.
about.ciemen_intro: CIEMEN is a cultural, not-for-profit, non-governmental Catalan organization with an international scope and over 40 years of experience in the field of stateless nations, minoritised peoples and diversity. It aims both to contribute to a better knowledge of peoples and nations that are marginalize or see their identity and existence threatened, and to support and foster the recognition and respect of individual and collective rights as a way to progress towards a lasting peace and democracy.
about.collectivat_intro:
Col·lectivaT is a non-profit cooperative located in Barcelona, consisting of a diverse team with expertise in various fields. The organization focuses on developing open-source technologies, providing language and translation services, conducting training and research in the social sector, and offering strategic advice and support.
Through its efforts, Col·lectivaT strives to address and diminish structural injustices and inequalities. The organization actively supports civil society organizations dedicated to working with minority cultures and languages to foster positive change.
about.casa_amaziga_intro: The Casa Amaziga de Catalunya is an entity that aims to be the reference for the Amazigh People in Catalonia and a meeting point between the Amazigh and Catalan communities.
about.main_text_2: We would also like to highlight our key collaborators who play a vital role in Awal.
about.contributor_farida_intro: Farida Boudichat Fortas. Linguist and teacher of Spanish, Catalan and English as foreign languages. She has realized sociolinguistic studies on the Amazigh language and collaborates with some entities to promote the language, especially its preservation and transmission.
about.contributor_ghizlan_intro: Lalla Ghizlan Baryala, Amazigh cultural activist in Catalonia, collaborates with various organizations to promote the history, language, and culture of the Amazigh people in the region. She studied marketing and market research at UOC and completed a postgraduate program in Digital Marketing and e-commerce.

terms.contribution_terms:
Awal is a non-profit initiative that contributes to the digitization of the Amazigh language through the collection of open-source datasets and the development of innovative tools.
Awal's web portal permits the free contribution of translated phrases for the objective of developing machine translation applications.
You can only make contributions and validate translated phrases by signing up for the initiative. By signing up, you must agree to abide by these terms. 
Awal also partners with Mozilla's Common Voice initiative for the collection of open-source speech datasets, enabling anyone to build voice-based applications for Tamazight. Please note that contributions to Common Voice are subject to
terms.contribution_terms_continued: In these terms, 'we,' 'our,' or 'us' refer to the collaborators and administrators of Awal, the non-profit initiative. 'You' or 'your' pertains to the user, contributor, or volunteer engaging with and contributing to the Awal platform.
terms.translation_contributions:
A translation contribution consists of a sentence in either Catalan, Spanish, English, Arabic, or French with its translation in Tamazight. You can translate from Tamazight to one of the other languages or vice versa. Contributions are accepted in both Tifinagh and the Latin alphabet.
The contributions are stored initially in Col·lectivaT's private cloud databases and will be periodically made available with a
terms.translation_continued_2:
This means that anyone can see the translations you make and use them as they like.
You must refrain from including any personally identifiable information in the sentences you submit.
The source sentences you translate from can either be your own creation or taken from non-copyrighted sources.
Your translations must also be your own creation, ensuring accuracy and respect while avoiding offensive or inappropriate content.
Project partners may conduct manual inspections of the contributions made by users. Failure to comply with any of these terms may result in the purging of your account and the removal of your contributions.
terms.random_sentence:
By using our “Random sentence” loading feature, you can access thousands of openly licensed sentences in all languages to translate. You can load as many times as you want and decide for yourself which one you want to translate.
Most of these sentences are community-uploaded sentences from the
terms.random_sentence_continued: If you come across any sentence that you think is offensive, racist, sexist, discriminatory, hateful, or otherwise violates our community guidelines, you can use the 'Report' button, and we will promptly investigate the issue and, if necessary, take appropriate action, including the removal of the offending content from our database.
terms.machine_translation: Awal Translate enables automatic translation between Tamazight and four languages. This feature is powered by
terms.machine_translation_continued:
an open-source model published for research purposes. However, the quality of Tamazight translations is currently quite low due to limited resources. One of the project's objectives is to enhance this model using the high-quality data we collect.
When making contributions, you have the option to use the machine translation feature to generate the translation to work with. However, it's crucial to edit this sentence appropriately to ensure accuracy. Machine-translated sentences without any edits are not accepted. Misuse of the machine translation feature may lead to the removal of your contributed phrases or even the suspension of your user account.
terms.validation: Awal also allows community validation of translated phrases. This is to ensure accuracy of the sentences we collect which is essential in obtaining accurate models. You can accept good translations and reject the ones with containing major errors, misspellings and mistranslations. Minor errors and variant differences shouldn't be counted as errors.
terms.profile:
You can fill in information like name, surname, age, sex, and language proficiency on the profile page. Your name, surname and e-mail address will not be disclosed publicly in any way.
Demographic information like age, sex, and linguistic proficiency allows us to gain knowledge about our contributors' profile and assess the bias, quality, and quantity of the data we collect. By providing this information, you give permission to publish your translations together with this information.
Your username is public and may be listed on the public leaderboards along with the contribution points you've gained. It is up to you to choose a username you like. Your username may be included in the published datasets alongside the translations you've submitted.
terms.scoring:
Contributors earn points for each translation they make. The points you gain are proportional to the length of the source phrase you input (when not using the “Random Sentence” feature) and the corresponding translation. If you utilize the machine translation feature, your target score will be calculated based on the number of changes you make.
It's important to note that scoring is designed solely for friendly competition and does not imply any form of compensation.
terms.communication: If you register for an account in Awal, you may receive emails from us in connection with your account. If you subscribe to our mailing list, you will receive additional information about the initiative like updates to the webpage, invitation to events and publication of news and resources.

how_it_works_contribution: Awal aims to create a high-quality and open-source machine translation application for Tamazight. The road to this goal goes through collecting many high-quality translated sentences in Tamazight. You can submit translations easily and in a fun way through this application. What you need to do is:
how_it_works_contribution_1: Select the language pair you want to translate using the drop-down menus. The language you want to translate from is on the left side of the screen, and the language you want to translate to is on the right side of the screen.
how_it_works_contribution_2: Write or load a sentence to translate on the left panel. You can be creative or take it from somewhere you have permissions to take. For example, this could be a text with Creative Commons license like wikipedia. If you like, you can also load a random sentence from our database using the button “Random Sentence”. Remember that the source phrase can be a word, a phrase, or a complete sentence but never more than one sentence. If you're translating from Tamazight, make sure you mark the variant below using the checkboxes. If you don't understand the sentence or don't like to translate, you can always load another sentence. If, somehow you come across an offensive or erroneous source phrase, make sure you report it using the “Report” button, and we will review it for its removal from our database.
how_it_works_contribution_3: Next, you should write the sentence's translation on the right panel. To help you start, you can use the prototype machine translation feature which will give you an approximate (bad) translation. Make sure you write a translation that's accurate and well-written. You can always consult the useful resources we list below. If you're translating to Tamazight, make sure you mark the variant using the checkboxes below.
how_it_works_contribution_4: Once you're done translating the sentence, hit the “Contribute” button, and your contribution will be saved. You will gain contribution points proportional to the length of the source phrase you input (when not using the “Random Sentence” feature) and the corresponding translation. If you utilize the machine translation feature, your target score will be calculated based on the number of changes you make.
how_it_works_contribution_continued: For additional information, refer to the contribution terms. If you need assistance, feel free to contact us at awal@collectivat.cat. Thank you for your valuable contribution!
how_it_works_validation: Validating translations is an essential step to maintain the integrity of the dataset and contribute to the development of a reliable machine translation application for Tamazight. In this screen, you will be shown translations made by other volunteers and verify if they're acceptable or not.
how_it_works_validation_1: Start by selecting the language pair and Tamazight variant for validations. You will see another volunteer's translation contribution. The source sentence will be displayed on the left panel, and the translated sentence is on the right panel.
how_it_works_validation_2: Assess the quality of the translation, keeping in mind that we aim for acceptability rather than perfection. Consider the following guidelines:
how_it_works_validation_2_1: Confirm if the translation conveys the meaning of the original sentence.
how_it_works_validation_2_2: Ensure that key terms and concepts are translated appropriately without losing their intended sense.
how_it_works_validation_2_3: Assess the fluency and natural flow of the translation. A good translation reads smoothly and feels natural in the target language.
how_it_works_validation_2_4: Verify that the translation adheres to grammatical rules and punctuation conventions of the target language.
how_it_works_validation_2_5: If a sentence comes up with words you are not sure of, you can always hit “Skip” to load another contribution.
how_it_works_validation_2_6: If you come across an offensive or harmful sentence (both source and translation), use the “Report” button.
how_it_works_validation_2_7: If you come across something that these guidelines don't cover, please vote according to your best judgement. If you really can't decide, skip to the next contribution.
how_it_works_validation_3: If you find the translation acceptable, click the check icon; if not, click the cross icon.
how_it_works_validation_continued: For additional information, refer to the contribution terms. If you need assistance, feel free to contact us at awal@collectivat.cat. Thank you for your valuable contribution!

Us de galetes (cookies)
Pot ser que aquest lloc web utilitzi cookies tècniques (petits arxius d'informació que el servidor envia a l'ordinador de qui accedeix a la pàgina) per dur a terme determinades funcions que es consideren imprescindibles per al correcte funcionament i visualització del web. En cap cas, aquestes cookies proporcionen per si mateixes dades de caràcter personal i no s'utilitzaran per recollir dades d'aquest tipus.
Mitjançant l'us de cookies també es possible que el servidor on es troba la web reconegui el navegador que utilitza l'usuari, amb la finalitat que la navegació sigui mes senzilla, tot permetent, per exemple, l'accés dels usuaris que s'hagin registrat prèviament a les àrees, serveis, promocions o concursos reservats exclusivament a ells sense haver de registrar-se a cada visita. També es poden utilitzar per mesurar l'audiència, paràmatres de trànsit, controlar el progrés i el nombre d'entrades, etc. En aquests casos, les cookies són prescindibles tècnicament però beneficioses per a l'usuari. Aquest lloc web no instal·larà cookies prescindibles sense el cosnentiment previ de l'usuari.

En qualsevol cas, retirarà inmediatament qualsevol contingut que pugui transgredir la legislació nacional o internacional, la moral o l'ordre públic, tot retirant inmediatament la redirecció a aquest lloc web i assabentant les autoritats competents del contingut en qüestió.

Això no obstant, i en compliment del que estableixen els articles 11 i 16 de la LSSICE, es posa a disposició de tots els usuaris, autoritats i forces de seguretat que col·laboren de manera activa en la retirada o, si escau, bloqueig de tots els continguts que puguin afectar o transgredir la legislació nacional o internacional, els drets de tercers o la moral i l'ordre públic. En cas que l'usuari consideri que el lloc web conté material que pugui ser susceptible d'aquesta classificació, li preguem que ho notifiqui inmediatament a l'administrador del lloc web. Aquest lloc web s'ha revisat i provat perque funcioni correctament. En principi, es pot garantir que funcionarà correctament els 365 dies de l'any i les 24 hores al dia. ADRECES IP
Els servidors del lloc web podràn detectar automàticament l'adreça IP i el nom del domini utilitzats per l'usuari. Una adreça IP es un numero assignat automaticament a un ordinador aixi que es connecta a Internet. cookies.cookies_text_1:
D'acord amb la normativa vigent, facilitem als usuaris informació relativa a les galetes (cookies) que utilitza i els motius del seu ús, així com sol·licita el seu consentiment per poder utilitzar-les. www.awaldigital.org utilitza galetes pròpies i de tercers per tal d'oferir una millor experiència de navegació i un millor servei. No obstant l'usuari té l'opció d'impedir la generació de galetes i l'eliminació de les mateixes mitjançant la selecció de la corresponent opció al seu navegador. En cas de bloquejar l'ús de les galetes al seu navegador, és possible que alguns serveis o funcionalitats de la pàgina web no estiguin disponibles.
Què és una galeta? Les galetes constitueixen una eina empleada pels servidors web per emmagatzemar i recuperar informació relativa als usuaris. Són petits arxius de text que les pàgines web envien al navegador i que s'emmagatzemen al terminal de l'usuari, ja sigui un ordinador, un telèfon mòbil o una tauleta. Aquesta informació permet recuperar informació com per exemple el seu usuari registrat, si en disposa, dades de connexió a les xarxes socials o dades de preferències de navegació. Aquestes dades són emmagatzemades per a ser recordades quan l'usuari visita de nou la pàgina.
Com s'utilitzen les galetes i quin tipus d'informació guarden? Al navegar per la pàgina web www.awaldigital.org al seu terminal que permetin conèixer la següent informació:
cookies.cookies_list_1: Informació estadística de l'ús de la web
cookies.cookies_list_2: El format de web que prefereix per accedir als dispositius mòbils
cookies.cookies_list_3: L'activitat que ha dut a terme l'usuari al web (pàgines vistes, cerques, etc.)
cookies.cookies_list_4: Dades de connexió a les xarxes socials per als usuaris que accedeixen amb el seu usuari de Facebook o Twitter
cookies.cookies_text_2:
En cas de bloquejar l'ús de galetes del seu navegador alguns dels serveis de la pàgina web deixaran d'estar disponibles.
Com puc bloquejar o eliminar les galetes? Pots permetre, bloquejar o eliminar les galetes que tens instal·lades al teu equip, a la configuració de les opcions del navegador de l'ordinador, ‘smartphone' o tauleta. El fet de bloquejar la instal·lació de les galetes no t'impedeix la navegació efectiva a la pàgina web.

privacy.privacy_item_2_txt_heading: CARÀCTER OBLIGATORI O FACULTATIU DE LA INFORMACIÓ FACILITADA PER LA PERSONA USUÀRIA
privacy.privacy_item_2_txt:
Les PERSONES USUÀRIES, per mitjà de les caselles corresponents I la introducció de dades en els camps, marcats amb l'asterisc (*) en el formulari de contacte o presentats en formularis de descàrrega, accepten expressament i de manera lliure e inequívoca, que les seves dades són necessàries per a l'atenció de la seva petició, per part del prestador, i que per tant la inclusió de les dades en els camps restants es voluntària. La PERSONA USUÀRIA garanteix que les dades personals facilitades al RESPONSABLE són verídiques i es fa responsable de comunicar-ne qualsevol modificació.
El RESPONSABLE informa que totes les dades sol·licitades a traves del lloc web són obligatòries, ja que són necessàries per a la prestació d'un servei òptima la PERSONA USUÀRIA.
En cas que no es facilitin totes les dades, no es garanteix que la informació i serveis facilitats s'ajustin completament a les seves necessitats.
privacy.privacy_item_3_txt:
Que, de conformitat amb el que estableixen les normatives vigents en protecció de dades personals, el RESPONSABLE està complint amb totes les disposicions de les normatives GDPR i LOPDGDD per al tractament de les dades personals de la seva responsabilitat, i manifestament amb els principis descrits a l'article 5 del GDPR, pels quals es tracten de manera lícita, lleial i transparent en relació amb l'interessat i adequades, pertinents i limitades al que es necessari en relació amb les finalitats per a les quals es tracten.
El RESPONSABLE garanteix que ha implementat polítiques tècniques i organitzatives apropiades per aplicar les mesures de seguretat que estableixen el GDPR i la LOPDGDD per tal de protegir els drets i llibertats de les PERSONES USUÀRIES i els ha comunicat la informació adequada perque puguin exercir-los.
